title: Certaine inducements to well minded people, who are heere straitned in their estates or otherwise or such as are willing out of noble and pub[l]ique principles, to tran[s]port themselves, or servants, or agents for them into the West-Indies, for the propagating the Gospell, and increase of trade.
note: Publication date [after 1644] based on reference on p. 10 to people having returned 'with the last fleet of the yeare 1644'. (Wing gives date [1643?]).
